actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit aliens who are independent living assistants to be accorded status as J nonimmigrants to provide in-home living and home support services to adults with disabilities.
short_title: Independent Living Assistance Access Act of 2005

summary.text: Independent Living Assistance Access Act of 2005 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide J (exchange visitor) nonimmigrant status to aliens working as independent living assistants (defined as individuals who provide in-home living and home support services to adults with disabilities). Requires aliens accorded such status to receive appropriate training prior to placement.

titles.title: Independent Living Assistance Access Act of 2005

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit aliens who are independent living assistants to be accorded status as J nonimmigrants to provide in-home living and home support services to adults with disabilities.
